trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE3_00469_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Yet again, at the center of the confluence of aether on the shore you find magicite. As you kneel to retrieve it, the confluence dissipates...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE3_00469_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>The magicite you have obtained may be used in conjunction with your magia board.
